TopicTitle: About the ION engines and new ARM parts

Articles.Content:
some people don't like the new ARM pack. and some do. I do.

I have a solution for the ION engine for you guys who don't like it. Go to the .cfg file and edit yourself to your liking.

If you don't like the new large parts, you could either not use them or delete them.

Hope it helped a wee bit
